strapiJob.title: Marketing Manager
strapiJob.description:
-       Manage all digital advertisement (paid and organic) programs to drive awareness to Natural Way consumers with healthy monthly budget

-       Create and manage Natural Way email marketing campaigns

-       Grow and enhance the Natural Way email list

-       Develop and grow a SMS program to further enrich customer experience and communication

-       Create original content including but not limited to photos, videos, blogs, recipes, etc.

-       Manage and grow our Influencer Marketing efforts including: collegiate athletes (NIL), professional athletes, and active lifestyle enthusiasts

-       Manage all social media accounts including Facebook, Instagram, Tik-Tok and Linkedin to drive awareness and sales to Natural Way e-commerce website.

-       Maintain and update Natural Way website to include latest press and recent retail partners with update store list

-       Set up and coordinate weekly meetings to establish weekly goals and metrics and track progress of various campaigns

-       Identify and facilitate co-branding opportunities with complimentary products and brands

-       Manage trade shows and events that Natural Way will attend
